40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The sign of a hypocrite is that whenever he speaks he lies, and whenever he makes a promise he does not fulfill it, and if he is entrusted he betrays

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عَلاَمَةِ الْمُنَافِقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Signs Of The Hypocrite
